caption: Agent Spec Deployment
description: Describes the details to deploy a A2A agent with Agent Spec.
name: agentspec_deployment

name.caption: Deployment Option Name
name.description: Name this deployment option is referred to within this agent. This is needed to indicate which one is preferred when this manifest is referred. Can be omitted, in such case selection is not possible.

agent_config.caption: Config Locator
agent_config.description: Location of the Agent Spec config. E.g. path to config, github repo url etc.

runtime_framework.caption: Runtime Framework
runtime_framework.description: Name for the runtime framework to use to run the Agent Spec config. The framework must be compatible with Agent Spec and A2A. Valid options: langgraph, wayflow.

runtime_deps.caption: Runtime Dependencies
runtime_deps.description: List of locators for the non-serializable objects this agent depends on (e.g. tool implementations).
